name: stackspin
description: Stackspin is a self-hosted Kubernetes-based platform for deploying curated open-source applications. It provides tooling and configuration for running a managed app stack.
features: Kubernetes platform: Deploys curated open-source apps on Kubernetes clusters.
App catalog: Provides pre-configured applications ready for deployment.
Helm charts: Uses Helm for standardized app packaging and deployment.
Multi-tenancy: Isolates apps and data for different users or organizations.
Automated backups: Backs up application data automatically to configured storage.
SSL management: Handles SSL certificates automatically with cert-manager.
Resource limits: Enforces CPU and memory limits per application.
Monitoring: Integrates Prometheus and Grafana for observability.
Single sign-on: Provides unified authentication across deployed applications.
Storage management: Manages persistent volumes for application data.
Update management: Handles application updates with rollback capability.
CLI tools: Manages platform and apps via command-line interface.
